name: Arkano Software
description:
Arkano is a solution provider for enterprises that uses technology for digital transformation. With offices in Uruguay, Chile, Perú, Argentina, Paraguay and USA, Arkano grows daily having more than a 100 collaborators and delivering over 300 projects to a wide range of clients worldwide.
Our 4 most important industries are Retail, Pharma, Manufacture & Resources and Finance. Within these industries we continue to grow in a human way, meaning WE ARE NOT ROBOTS, we don't know everything but we sure love to learn. We want our clients to be succesful, using top notch technology and solutions to grow in their business.
We have been recognized as Microsoft Partner of the Year 2011, 2013, 2014, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019.
